titles.title: SNACK Act
Securing Nutrition for American Communities and Kids Act of 2022
SNACK Act
To amend the Families First Coronavirus Response Act to extend certain waivers related to child nutrition, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Securing Nutrition for American Communities and Kids Act of 2022 or the SNACK Act
This bill extends the authority of the Department of Agriculture (USDA) to waive certain requirements for the school meal programs and the Child and Adult Care Food Program to address COVID-19, including by extending authority through September 30, 2022, for USDA to grant waivers related to the summer food service program.
